subtitle: This app is anonymous and doesn't track your data.

phq2.disclaimerText: This is an anonymous screening tool based on the PHQ-2 questionnaire. It is not a diagnostic tool and should not replace professional medical advice.
disclaimerPoints: Your responses are completely private and not stored
This tool is for educational and awareness purposes
If you're in crisis, please call 988 immediately
Always consult with healthcare providers for medical advice
phq2.question1: Over the past 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by little interest or pleasure in doing things?
phq2.question2: Over the past 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by feeling down, depressed, or hopeless?

talkNow.title: Talk Now - Immediate Support
talkNow.description: Your responses suggest you could benefit from speaking with someone right away. Please reach out to these confidential resources:
actions: Call or text a crisis helpline

resources: Crisis Text Line: Text HOME to 741741

next48h.title: Next 48 Hours - Professional Support
next48h.description: Your responses indicate it would be helpful to connect with a mental health professional soon:
actions: Schedule an appointment within the next 2 days
Reach out to local counseling services
Talk to a school counselor or healthcare provider

selfHelp.title: Self-Help & Wellness
selfHelp.description: Your responses are in a range that many people experience. Here are resources to support your mental wellness:
actions: Monitor your mood over the next 2 weeks
Build a support network with friends/family

copingStrategies.title: Immediate Coping Strategies
techniques: 5-4-3-2-1 grounding: Name 5 things you see, 4 things you feel, 3 things you hear, 2 things you smell, 1 thing you taste
Progressive muscle relaxation: Tense and release each muscle group

dailyPractices.title: Daily Wellness Practices
practices: Gratitude journaling - write 3 things you're thankful for
